covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, increasing movement speed by 30%. You may reactivate Soulshape to teleport 10 yds forward.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 10 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Elysian Decree
covenants.description:
Place a Kyrian Sigil at the target location that activates after 2 sec.

Detonates to deal (120% of Attack power) Arcane damage and shatter up to 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil.

covenants.name: The Hunt
covenants.description:
Charge to an enemy, inflicting (250% of Attack power) Nature damage and rooting them in place for 3 sec. The target is marked for 1 min, increasing your Fury from 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Demon's Bites</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Shears</dynamic>

 against them by 50%.

You may reactivate The Hunt every 30 sec to teleport behind the marked target, ignoring line of sight.

covenants.name: Fodder to the Flame
covenants.description:
Commission a duel to the death against a Condemned Demon from the Theater of Pain. Vanquishing your foe releases its demon soul and creates a pool of demon blood that lasts for 30 sec. Fighting within the pool increases your attack speed by 20% and reduces the damage that enemies deal to you by 10%.

Fleshcraft treats the Condemned Demon as a powerful enemy.

covenants.name: Sinful Brand
covenants.description:
Brand an enemy with the mark of the Venthyr, reducing their melee and casting speeds by 30% and inflicting (400% of Attack power) Shadow damage over 8 sec.

Activating Metamorphosis applies Sinful Brand to all nearby enemies.

conduits.name: Fel Defender
conduits.description:
The cooldown of 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Blur</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Fiery Brand</dynamic>

 is reduced by <dynamic>10 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Shattered Restoration
conduits.description: The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by <dynamic>10%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Felfire Haste
conduits.description:
Your movement speed is increased by <dynamic>5%</dynamic> after casting 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Fel Rush</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Infernal Strike</dynamic>

conduits.name: Ravenous Consumption
conduits.description:
Your movement speed is increased by <dynamic>15%</dynamic> after casting 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Fel Rush</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Infernal Strike</dynamic>

conduits.name: Demonic Parole
conduits.description: Enemies that leave your Imprison are snared by 50% for <dynamic>10 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Lost in Darkness
conduits.description: Increases the duration of Spectral Sight by <dynamic>3 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Demon's Touch
conduits.description: Demon's Bite increases the damage of other abilities by <dynamic>5%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Dancing with Fate
conduits.description: Blade Dance has a <dynamic>5%</dynamic> chance to apply Essence Break.

conduits.name: Serrated Glaive
conduits.description: Spending <dynamic>8</dynamic> Fury buffs the damage of Eye Beam by 8%.

conduits.name: Growing Inferno
conduits.description: Immolation Aura's damage is increases by an additional <dynamic>5%</dynamic> each time it deals damage.

legendaries.name: Sigil of the Illidari
legendaries.description: Casting [Eye Beam][Fel Devastation] summons an allied [Vengeance][Havoc] Demon Hunter who casts [Fel Devastation][Eye Beam].

legendaries.name: Apexis Empowerment
legendaries.description: Metamorphosis increases your size, movement speed, and melee range by 100%.

legendaries.name: Darkglare Medallion
legendaries.description:
<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Eye Beam</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Fel Devastation</dynamic>

 has a 20% chance to not incur its cooldown.

legendaries.name: Darkest Hour
legendaries.description: You automatically trigger Darkness when you fall below 35% health. This effect can only occur once every 2 min.

legendaries.name: Spirit of the Darkness Flame
legendaries.description: Your Fiery Brand now heals you for 100% of the damage done and each enemy hit by your Sigil of Flame increases the instant damage of your next Fiery Brand by 15%, stacking up to 15 times.

legendaries.name: Razelikh's Defilement
legendaries.description: Soul Cleave reduces the remaining cooldown on a random Sigil by 8 sec.

legendaries.name: Cloak of Fel Flames
legendaries.description: You take 15% reduced magic damage while Immolation Aura is active.

legendaries.name: Fiery Soul
legendaries.description: Each Soul Fragment consumed by Soul Cleave reduces the cooldown of Fiery Brand by 2 sec.

legendaries.name: Inner Demons
legendaries.description: Chaos Strike has a chance to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal (136.5% of Attack power) Chaos damage to all nearby enemies.

legendaries.name: Chaos Theory
legendaries.description: Blade Dance has a 10% chance to grant you Chaotic Blades, increasing the damage of Chaos Strike by 25% and its chance to refund Fury by an additional 60% for 8 sec.

legendaries.name: Erratic Fel Core
legendaries.description: The cooldown of Fel Rush is reduced by 30%.

legendaries.name: Fel Bombardment
legendaries.description: Immolation Aura damage has a chance to grant you a stack of Fel Bombardment, increasing the damage of your next Throw Glaive by 20% and launching an additional glaive at a nearby target. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
